name: GKP Simulator 3
description:
Hello there !
Here is my contribution for the game jam "Not a GameJam II" on the theme "un gardien"

Goal of the game :
You are playing as an handball goalkeeper and you have to make enough saves with your body until the time stop to win the match.

Controls :

  • Z-Q-S-D to move around.
  • Mouse to move the camera

Team : 

  • Game programmer : Christopher Grassi a.k.a Chaotic Monkey
  • Music and sound design mix : Cyril Trigaux a.k.a LittleBigTri

To play the game :

  1. Download the "GKPSimulator3.zip" file
  2. Launch "GKPSimulator3.exe" application
